languages.text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Голос Равора в воксе звучит скорее утомленно, чем раздраженно.{/n} "Мне тут докладывают, что к нам двигается несколько судов. Судя по тому, что на запросы они не отвечают, а телеметрия показывает след от макробатарей, разговаривать они с нами не собираются. Готов отдать приказ о подготовке к битве в любой момент, как прикажете".

"Lord Cap'n..." {n}Ravor's voice over the vox sounds weary rather than annoyed.{/n} "I'm getting reports of several ships moving toward us. Judging by the fact that they're not responding to our hails and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they're not here for a chinwag. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Голос Равора в воксе звучит скорее утомленно, чем раздраженно.{/n} "Мне тут докладывают, что к нам двигается несколько судов. Судя по тому, что на запросы они не отвечают, а телеметрия показывает след от макробатарей, разговаривать они с нами не собираются. Готов отдать приказ о подготовке к битве в любой момент, как прикажете".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}Ravor's voice in the vox sounds weary rather than annoyed.{/n} "I am getting reports of several ships moving toward us. Judging by the fact that they're not responding to inquiries and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they are not here for a conversation. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."

"Lord Captain..." {n}Ravor's voice in the vox sounds weary rather than annoyed.{/n} "I am getting reports of several ships moving toward us. Judging by the fact that they're not responding to inquiries and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they are not here for a conversation. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."

Judging by the fact that they're not responding to our hails and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they're not here for a chinwag. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."

"Lord Cap'n..." {n}Ravor's voice over the vox sounds weary rather than annoyed.{/n} "I'm getting reports of several ships moving toward us. Judging by the fact that they're not responding to our hails and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they're not here for a chinwag. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."

"Lord Cap'n..." {n}Ravor's voice over the vox sounds weary rather than annoyed.{/n} "I'm getting reports of several ships moving toward us. Judging by the fact that they're not responding to our hails and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they're not here for a chinwag. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}ヴォクス越しのラヴォアの声は、苛ついていると言うよりは疲れているように聞こえる。{/n}「こちらに向かって接近する船が多数あります。奴らが我々の呼びかけに応答していないことと、テレメトリがマクロバッテリーの軌跡を示していることから判断すると、おしゃべりしに来たわけではなさそうです。戦闘の準備はいつでもできております。ご命令を」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n..." {n}Ravor's voice over the vox sounds weary rather than annoyed.{/n} "I'm getting reports of several ships moving toward us. Judging by the fact that they're not responding to our hails and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they're not here for a chinwag. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}ヴォクス越しのラヴォアの声は、苛ついていると言うよりは疲れているように聞こえる。{/n}「こちらに向かって接近する船が多数あります。奴らが我々の呼びかけに応答していないことと、テレメトリがマクロバッテリーの軌跡を示していることから判断すると、おしゃべりしに来たわけではなさそうです。戦闘の準備はいつでもできております。ご命令を」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}... » {n}La voix de Ravor résonne dans le vox. Il semble plus épuisé qu'agacé.{/n} « On m'indique que de nombreux vaisseaux se dirigent dans notre direction. Étant donné qu'ils ne répondent pas à nos communications et que les relevés télémétriques indiquent la présence de macro-batteries, j'en déduis qu'ils ne sont pas là pour discuter le bout de gras. J'attends vos ordres pour nous préparer au combat. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n..." {n}Ravor's voice over the vox sounds weary rather than annoyed.{/n} "I'm getting reports of several ships moving toward us. Judging by the fact that they're not responding to our hails and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they're not here for a chinwag. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}... » {n}La voix de Ravor résonne dans le vox. Il semble plus épuisé qu'agacé.{/n} « On m'indique que de nombreux vaisseaux se dirigent dans notre direction. Étant donné qu'ils ne répondent pas à nos communications et que les relevés télémétriques indiquent la présence de macro-batteries, j'en déduis qu'ils ne sont pas là pour discuter le bout de gras. J'attends vos ordres pour nous préparer au combat. »

languages.text: “船长老大……”{n}雷沃的声音听起来不太恼怒，更像是疲惫。{/n}“我收到了报告，说有几艘飞船正朝我们飞过来。他们对我们的呼叫没有回应，遥测数据也显示他们的宏炮炮台正在装填。由此看来，他们不是来闲聊的。只要你一声令下，我们就准备开战。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n..." {n}Ravor's voice over the vox sounds weary rather than annoyed.{/n} "I'm getting reports of several ships moving toward us. Judging by the fact that they're not responding to our hails and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they're not here for a chinwag. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."

traits.locale_text: “船长老大……”{n}雷沃的声音听起来不太恼怒，更像是疲惫。{/n}“我收到了报告，说有几艘飞船正朝我们飞过来。他们对我们的呼叫没有回应，遥测数据也显示他们的宏炮炮台正在装填。由此看来，他们不是来闲聊的。只要你一声令下，我们就准备开战。”

languages.text: «Lord Capi...». {n}La voz de Ravor a través de su voco suena más cansada que molesta.{/n} «Me consta que varias naves se dirigen hacia nosotros. A juzgar por que no responden a nuestros avisos y la telemetría indica el uso de macrobaterías, no vienen para charlar tranquilamente. A la espera de órdenes de prepararse para la batalla».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n..." {n}Ravor's voice over the vox sounds weary rather than annoyed.{/n} "I'm getting reports of several ships moving toward us. Judging by the fact that they're not responding to our hails and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they're not here for a chinwag. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capi...». {n}La voz de Ravor a través de su voco suena más cansada que molesta.{/n} «Me consta que varias naves se dirigen hacia nosotros. A juzgar por que no responden a nuestros avisos y la telemetría indica el uso de macrobaterías, no vienen para charlar tranquilamente. A la espera de órdenes de prepararse para la batalla».

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n ..." {n}Ravors Stimme über das Vox klingt eher erschöpft denn verärgert.{/n} "Mir wird gemeldet, dass sich uns mehrere Schiffe nähern. Sie reagieren nicht auf unsere Kontaktversuche, und die Telemetrie zeigt eine Signatur von Makrobatterien, sie sind also wohl nicht zum Plaudern hier. Ich erwarte Euren Befehl, in Gefechtsbereitschaft zu gehen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n..." {n}Ravor's voice over the vox sounds weary rather than annoyed.{/n} "I'm getting reports of several ships moving toward us. Judging by the fact that they're not responding to our hails and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they're not here for a chinwag. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n ..." {n}Ravors Stimme über das Vox klingt eher erschöpft denn verärgert.{/n} "Mir wird gemeldet, dass sich uns mehrere Schiffe nähern. Sie reagieren nicht auf unsere Kontaktversuche, und die Telemetrie zeigt eine Signatur von Makrobatterien, sie sind also wohl nicht zum Plaudern hier. Ich erwarte Euren Befehl, in Gefechtsbereitschaft zu gehen."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan..." {n}Ravor'un vokstan gelen sesinde hiddetten ziyade bitkinlik hissediliyor.{/n} "Bize yaklaşan birkaç gemi olduğunu haber aldım. Çağrılarımıza cevap vermiyorlar. Uzölçüm sonuçları, makro bataryaları olduğunu işaret ediyor. Hoşbeş etmeye gelmedikleri aşikâr. Savaşa hazırlanılmasını emretmeye hazırlanın derim."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n..." {n}Ravor's voice over the vox sounds weary rather than annoyed.{/n} "I'm getting reports of several ships moving toward us. Judging by the fact that they're not responding to our hails and the telemetry shows a trail of macro batteries, they're not here for a chinwag. Ready to issue orders to prepare for battle at your command."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan…" {n}Ravor'un vokstan gelen sesinde hiddetten ziyade bitkinlik hissediliyor.{/n} "Bize yaklaşan birkaç gemi olduğuna dair istihbarat aldım. Çağrılarımıza cevap vermiyorlar, uzölçüm sonuçları makro bataryaların varlığına işaret ediyor. Hoşbeş etmeye gelmedikleri aşikâr. Savaş hazırlıkları için emir vermeye hazırlanın derim."
